main event: Two military officers observed a strange unidentified object over Fort Bragg, North Carolina, on 20 June 1958.
interesting points: The object was bright red-orange in color and increased in speed over 10 minutes., It appeared to be the size of a dime at arm's length before decreasing in size as it accelerated., The object displayed a pulsating or flickering motion and increased in brightness as it moved away., Observers reported the object did not resemble any known aircraft or aerial vehicle., There were multiple military observations of unidentified flying objects in the Fort Bragg area during this time frame.
